name: MyCity Civic Center
description: MyCity Civic Center is located on Main Street and contains facilities for a number of civic and community services available.
transportation: MyCity Civic Center is serviced by the number 1 Bus and is a short walk from the Main Street Metro Station

languages.name: Urdu
languages.note: Translation services provided via bilingual staff when they are available

phones.description: Our main reception phone number. The phones will be available from 0800 (8am) until 1800 (6pm) local time. There may be some slight delays in answering your call if we are busy.

languages.name: Urdu
languages.note: Translation services provided via bilingual staff when they are available

accessibilitys.description: The building is equipped with induction loops for hearing aids. Wheelchair access is possible on all levels.
accessibilitys.details: Switch hearing aid to T-coil to access the induction loop facility.

phones.description: Our main reception phone number. The phones will be available from 0800 (8am) until 1800 (6pm) local time. There may be some slight delays in answering your call if we are busy.

languages.name: Urdu
languages.note: Translation services provided via bilingual staff when they are available

schedules.description: The service is available from 10 am to 6pm weekdays. The service is not available on public holidays.
schedules.attending_type: You can attend this service in-person or remotely via video conferencing
schedules.notes: Some of our staff will be unavailable during their lunch break which may be any 30 minute period between 1200 and 1400
